body_html:
Hi, thank you very much for your reply!

I actually tried using both:
netG.load_state_dict(torch.load(opt.netG, map_location=lambda storage, loc: storage))
and
netG.load_state_dict(torch.load(opt.netG, map_location='cpu')).

Unfortunately, then I get in both cases the error:
KeyError: 'unexpected key "dense_block1.denselayer1.norm.1.weight" in state_dict'.

body:
Hi, thank you very much for your reply!

I actually tried using both:
netG.load_state_dict(torch.load(opt.netG, map_location=lambda storage, loc: storage)) 
and
netG.load_state_dict(torch.load(opt.netG, map_location='cpu')).

Unfortunately, then I get in both cases the error: 
KeyError: 'unexpected key "dense_block1.denselayer1.norm.1.weight" in state_dict'.
